item.title: Bollard shell is damaged/vandalised problem, 24th October
item.description:
Bollards are down, 4 Illuminated bollards, 2 are down on Court road heading from brockworth to the roundabout. 1 on Perrybrook Road 1 on Stilchester Road
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rattling manhole cover, 24th October
item.description:
Manhole cover in junction of North Street and Greet Road. Makes loud 'clack clack' noise every time a vehicle passes over it. Very disturbing for residents, especially when trying to sleep! Been doing it for about a week now, hasn't settled down at all.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 24th October
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entrance to Arle Close is being obstructed by same parked car., 24th October
item.description:
Causing difficulty for our waste collection crews to fit vehicle down the close. The car have been given a parked car letter numerous times, but will not move. Due to this issue, we are unable to reverse into the close as the vehicle has already caused damage to a residents roof tiles. We are wondering if this close could potentially have double yellow lines, could this be looked into please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Arle Close, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
